cast.original_title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile
cast.overview: A chronicle of the crimes of Ted Bundy, from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, Elizabeth Kloepfer, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.
cast.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile

cast.overview: Superman, a journalist in Metropolis, embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent.
cast.title: Superman

also_known_as: アンジェラ・サラフィアン
details.biography:
Angela Sarafyan, sometimes credited as Angela Sarafian, is an Armenian-American actress. She has appeared as a guest star in several television series and has acted in the feature films: Kabluey (2007), On the Doll (2007), A Beautiful Life (2008), The Informers (2008), A Good Old Fashioned Orgy (2011), Lost & Found in Armenia (2012), and Reminiscence (2021).

She portrayed Clementine Pennyfeather throughout the four seasons of the HBO series Westworld (2016–22).
details.name: Angela Sarafyan
